title: Aye Finance raises $30 million in debt from Dutch development bank
description: FMO is the Dutch entrepreneurial development bank, with a mission to empower entrepreneurs to build a better world. As a leading impact investor, FMO supports sustainable private sector growth in developing countries and emerging markets by investing in ambitious projects and entrepreneurs. Aye's net profit in FY24 grew nearly three-fold at Rs 161 crore while revenue was 67% higher at Rs 1072 crores as compared to the numbers in the preceding fiscal.
